Public NotInheritable Class EntityConnection Inherits DbConnection
public ref class EntityConnection sealed : System::Data::Common::DbConnection

summary.span: 包含对概念模型和数据源连接的引用。

span.span: Contains a reference to a conceptual model and a data source connection.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了避免无意使对象（如 和 ）与其元数据失去同步， 必须锁定对象的元数据。To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as and out of sync with their metadata, must lock its metadata. 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 实例通过默认的构造函数或接受连接字符串的 构造函数进行构造。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the constructor, which accepts a connection string. 在任何一种情况下，连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 调用 或 锁定元数据。Calling or locks the metadata. - 实例通过 构造函数进行构造，此构造函数接受 和 。The instance is constructed through the constructor, which accepts a and a . 在这种情况下，元数据在构造时锁定。In this case, the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 加载元数据后， 验证概念性模型、存储模型和映射文件是否全部存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present. 有关代码示例，请参阅[使用 EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5)。For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了避免无意使对象（如 和 ）与其元数据失去同步， 必须锁定对象的元数据。To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as and out of sync with their metadata, must lock its metadata. 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 实例通过默认的构造函数或接受连接字符串的 构造函数进行构造。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the constructor, which accepts a connection string. 在任何一种情况下，连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 调用 或 锁定元数据。Calling or locks the metadata. - 实例通过 构造函数进行构造，此构造函数接受 和 。The instance is constructed through the constructor, which accepts a and a . 在这种情况下，元数据在构造时锁定。In this case the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 加载元数据后， 验证概念性模型、存储模型和映射文件是否全部存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present. 有关代码示例，请参阅[使用 EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5)。For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成应用程序的配置文件中存储的已命名的连接字符串。The generate a named connection string that is stored in the application's configuration file. 可以提供此已命名的连接字符串来代替了`connectionString`参数实例化时类。This named connection string can be supplied in place of the `connectionString` parameter when you instantiate the class. 为了避免无意使对象（如 和 ）与其元数据失去同步， 必须锁定对象的元数据。To avoid inadvertently putting objects and out of sync with their metadata, must lock its metadata. 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 实例通过默认的构造函数或接受连接字符串的构造函数（）进行构造。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through this constructor (), which accepts a connection string. 在任何一种情况下，连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 调用 或 锁定元数据。Calling or locks the metadata. - 实例通过 构造函数进行构造，此构造函数接受 和 。The instance is constructed through the constructor, which accepts a and a . 在这种情况下，元数据在构造时锁定。In this case the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 加载元数据后， 验证概念性模型、存储模型和映射文件是否全部存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present. 有关代码示例，请参阅[使用 EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5)。For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使您可从非磁盘文件或非程序集嵌入资源的元数据创建 。This constructor enables you to create an from metadata that is not from a file on a disk or from an embedded resource in an assembly. 为了避免无意使对象（如 和 ）与其元数据失去同步， 必须锁定对象的元数据。To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as and out of sync with their metadata, the must lock its metadata. 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 实例通过默认的构造函数或接受连接字符串的 构造函数进行构造。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the constructor, which accepts a connection string. 在任何一种情况下，连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 调用 或 锁定元数据。Calling or locks the metadata. - 实例通过构造函数（）进行构造，此构造函数接受 和 。The instance is constructed through this constructor (), which accepts a and a . 在这种情况下，元数据在构造时锁定。In this case the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 加载元数据后， 验证概念性模型、存储模型和映射文件是否全部存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.

span.span: Begins a transaction by using the underlying provider.
A new .

returns.span: 返回的 实例以后可以与 关联以执行该事务下的命令。

span.span: The returned instance can later be associated with the to execute the command under that transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 事务隔离级别。The method uses the transaction isolation level. 若要指定不同的隔离级别，请调用 。To specify a different isolation level, call . 不同的基础提供程序可能用不同的方法对此值进行解释。This value might be interpreted differently by different underlying providers. 如果要应用程序可以跨多个提供程序移植，该应用程序应通过调用 显式指定事务隔离级别。If you want your application to be portable across multiple providers, it should explicitly specify the transaction isolation level by calling . 任何特定时刻都只能存在一个通过 创建的活动事务。At any particular moment there can be no more than one active transaction that was created through . 尝试对已具有当前事务的 调用任何 重载将引发 。An attempt to call any of the overloads on an that already has a current transaction results in an .

span.span: The underlying provider is not known.
-or-

-or-

summary.span: 关闭与数据库之间的连接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果基础数据提供程序未知，则调用 将不起任何作用。If the underlying data provider is not known, the call to does nothing.

span.span: An error occurred when closing the connection.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ConnectionString { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property ConnectionString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 连接字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the connection string.

value.span: 建立与数据源的初始连接所需的连接字符串。

span.span: The connection string required to establish the initial connection to a data source.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

value.span: 连接关闭时，将返回当前设置的值。

span.span: On a closed connection, the currently set value is returned.

value.span: 如果未设置任何值，则将返回一个空字符串。

span.span: If no value has been set, an empty string is returned.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `EntityClient`连接字符串关键字/值参数对用分号分隔的序列组成。An `EntityClient` connection string consists of a sequence of keyword/value parameter pairs separated by semicolons. 每个关键字和它的值之间用等号 (=) 连接。The equals sign (=) connects each keyword and its value. 下表列出了 中的关键字值的有效名称。The following table lists the valid names for keyword values in the . |关键字Keyword|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`Provider`|此关键字在未指定 `Name` 关键字时是必需的。Required if the `Name` keyword is not specified. 提供程序名称，用于检索基础提供程序的 对象。The provider name, which is used to retrieve the object for the underlying provider. 该值为常量。This value is constant.

当`Name`关键字不包括在连接字符串的非空值`Provider`关键字是必需的。When the `Name` keyword is not included in the connection string, a non-empty value for the `Provider` keyword is required. 此关键字与 `Name` 关键字互斥。This keyword is mutually exclusive with the `Name` keyword.| |`Provider Connection String`|可选。Optional. 指定要传递给基础数据源的提供程序特定的连接字符串。Specifies the provider-specific connection string that is passed to the underlying data source. 此连接字符串用数据提供程序的有效关键字/值对表示。This connection string is expressed by using valid keyword/value pairs for the data provider. 如果 `Provider Connection String` 无效，则当数据源计算此字符串时，将导致运行时错误。An invalid `Provider Connection String` will cause a run-time error when it is evaluated by the data source.

此关键字与 `Name` 关键字互斥。This keyword is mutually exclusive with the `Name` keyword.

`Provider Connection String` 的值必须用引号引起来。The value of the `Provider Connection String` must be surrounded by quotes. 下面是一个示例：The following is an example:

`Provider Connection String ="Server=serverName; User ID = userID";`

以下示例将无效：The following example is not going to work:

`Provider Connection String =Server=serverName; User ID = userID`| |`Metadata`|此关键字在未指定 `Name` 关键字时是必需的。Required if the `Name` keyword is not specified. 竖线分隔目录、 文件和要在其中查找有关模型和映射信息的资源位置的列表。A pipe-delimited list of directories, files, and resource locations in which to look for model and mapping information. 下面是一个示例：The following is an example:

`Metadata=`

`c:\model | c:\model\sql\mapping.msl;`

竖线分隔符两侧的空格将被忽略。Blank spaces on each side of the pipe separator are ignored.

此关键字与 `Name` 关键字互斥。This keyword is mutually exclusive with the `Name` keyword.| |`Name`|应用程序可以选择在应用程序配置文件中指定连接名称，以用于提供所需的关键字/值连接字符串值。The application can optionally specify the connection name in an application configuration file that provides the required keyword/value connection string values. 在此情况下，无法在连接字符串中直接提供这些值。In this case, you cannot supply them directly in the connection string. 配置文件中不允许出现 `Name` 关键字。The `Name` keyword is not allowed in a configuration file.

如果连接字符串中未包含 `Name` 关键字，则需要一个非空的 Provider 关键字值。When the `Name` keyword is not included in the connection string, a non-empty values for Provider keyword is required.

此关键字与所有其他连接字符串关键字互斥。This keyword is mutually exclusive with all the other connection string keywords.| 应用程序可以提供关键字/值直接在属性，也可以指定的值`Name`关键字。The application can supply the keyword/values directly in the property, or it can specify a value for the `Name` keyword. 如果`Name`指定关键字、 连接字符串关键字/值从检索应用程序配置文件，如下所示：If the `Name` keyword is specified, the connection string keyword/values are retrieved from an application configuration file, as follows: `Name=AdventureWorksEntities;` 如果`Name`中使用关键字属性，不允许其他关键字。If the `Name` keyword is used in the property, other keywords are not allowed. `Name`关键字是指存储在已命名的连接字符串`connectionStrings`部分应用程序配置文件中，如以下示例所示。The `Name` keyword refers to a named connection string that is stored in the `connectionStrings` section in an application configuration file, as shown in the following example. `Provider`， `Metadata`，和`Provider Connection String`在运行时从配置文件检索值。The `Provider`, `Metadata`, and `Provider Connection String` values are retrieved from the configuration file at run time. 应用程序也可以直接在 属性中提供关键字/值对，如下面的示例所示。The keyword/value pairs can also be supplied directly in the property, as shown in the following example. 在这种情况下，`Name`未使用关键字。In this case, the `Name` keyword is not used. ``` "Provider=System.Data.SqlClient; Metadata=c:\metadata|c:\Metadata\Sql; Provider Connection String= 'Data Source=localhost; Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Integrated Security=True;Connection Timeout=60' " ``` 为了避免无意使对象（如 和 ）与其元数据失去同步， 必须锁定对象的元数据。To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as and out of sync with their metadata, must lock its metadata. 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 实例通过默认的构造函数或接受连接字符串的 构造函数进行构造。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the constructor, which accepts a connection string. 在任何一种情况下，连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 调用 或 锁定元数据。Calling or locks the metadata. - 实例通过 构造函数进行构造，此构造函数接受 和 。The instance is constructed through the constructor, which accepts a and a . 在这种情况下，元数据在构造时锁定。In this case the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 加载元数据后， 验证概念性模型、存储模型和映射文件是否全部存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何配合使用 和 。The following example demonstrates how to use the in conjunction with a . 该代码将设置的属性`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`创建提供基础提供程序连接字符串的一部分的字符串。The code sets properties of a `SqlConnectionStringBuilder` to create a string that supplies part of the underlying provider connection string. 请注意，`Provider`名称不能通过使用设置`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`，因为它不使用有效`SqlConnection`语法。Note that the `Provider` name cannot be set by using the `SqlConnectionStringBuilder`, because it does not use valid `SqlConnection` syntax. 该代码创建通过设置字符串`EntityConnectionStringBuilder`属性。The code creates the string by setting `EntityConnectionStringBuilder` properties. [!code-csharp[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/CS/Program.cs#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)] [!code-vb[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/VB/Program.vb#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)]

public: virtual property int ConnectionTimeout { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取从尝试建立连接到结束尝试并生成错误需要等待的秒数。

span.span: Gets the number of seconds to wait when attempting to establish a connection before ending the attempt and generating an error.

value.span: 等待连接打开所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.

value.span: 默认值为基础数据提供程序的默认超时值。

span.span: The default value is the underlying data provider's default time-out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果基础数据提供程序未知，则返回零。Returns zero if the underlying data provider is not known.

span.span: The value set is less than 0.

summary.span: 获取当前数据库或将在连接打开后使用的数据库的名称。

summary.span: 返回与此 关联的 。

span.span: Returns the associated with this .
The associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 类时，将自动创建 。A is automatically created when the class is created. 创建过程可能引发特定元数据异常。The creation process might throw metadata-specific exceptions. 元数据将被加载到内存中，Entity Data Model (EDM) 应用程序则使用该元数据访问有关基础数据源的信息。Metadata is loaded into memory and an Entity Data Model (EDM) application uses that metadata to access information about the underlying data source. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ADO.NET 元数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/196097a5-a791-4ac4-9e6a-805685d481d5)。For more information, see [ADO.NET Metadata](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/196097a5-a791-4ac4-9e6a-805685d481d5). 为了避免无意使对象（如 和 ）与其元数据失去同步， 必须锁定对象的元数据。To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as and out of sync with their metadata, must lock its metadata. 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 实例通过默认的构造函数或接受连接字符串的 构造函数进行构造。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the constructor, which accepts a connection string. 在任一情况下连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。In either case the connection string may be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 或锁定元数据。 or locks the metadata. - 实例通过 构造函数进行构造，此构造函数接受 和 。The instance is constructed through the constructor, which accepts a and a . 在这种情况下，元数据在构造时锁定。In this case the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 加载元数据后， 验证概念性模型、存储模型和映射文件是否全部存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.

exception.span: 内联连接字符串包含一个无效的 关键字值。

span.span: The inline connection string contains an invalid keyword value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Open() cil managed

summary.span: 通过调用基础数据提供程序的 方法，建立与数据源的连接。

span.span: Establishes a connection to the data source by calling the underlying data provider's method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了避免无意使对象（如 和 ）与其元数据失去同步， 必须锁定对象的元数据。To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as and out of sync with their metadata, must lock its metadata. 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 实例通过默认的构造函数或接受连接字符串的 构造函数进行构造。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the constructor, which accepts a connection string. 在任何一种情况下，连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 调用 或 锁定元数据。Calling or locks the metadata. - 实例通过 构造函数进行构造，此构造函数接受 和 。The instance is constructed through the constructor, which that accepts a and a . 在这种情况下，元数据在构造时锁定。In this case the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 加载元数据后， 验证概念性模型、存储模型和映射文件是否全部存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.

exception.span: 打开连接时出错，或基础数据提供程序的名称未知。

span.span: An error occurs when you open the connection, or the name of the underlying data provider is not known.

exception.span: 内联连接字符串包含一个无效的 关键字值。

span.span: The inline connection string contains an invalid keyword value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StoreConnection As DbConnection
public: property System::Data::Common::DbConnection ^ StoreConnection { System::Data::Common::DbConnection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 提供对 对象使用的基础数据源连接的访问。

span.span: Provides access to the underlying data source connection that is used by the object.
The for the data source connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 对象已关闭，则返回的数据源连接将关闭。If the object is closed, the returned data source connection will be closed. 如果该对象已打开，则将返回打开的数据源连接。If it is open, an open data source connection will be returned. 如果设置了数据源连接信息，则返回的值始终为非 null。If the data source connection information was set, the returned value is always non-null. 如果不存在数据源连接信息（例如，如果使用默认的构造函数，并且之后没有设置连接字符串），则返回一个 null 引用。If there is no data source connection information (for example, if the default constructor was used and no connection string was set afterwards), then a null reference is returned. Entity Framework The same data source connection used by the Entity Framework can be shared with other parts of an application. 数据源连接以 对象的形式从 的 属性或从 的 属性返回。The data source connection is returned as a object from the property of , or from the property of .
